programme.title: The Mallorca Files
programme.sub-title: Symphonie de la vie et de la mort
programme.desc: Miranda and Max investigate the death of a world-famous DJ after he plays at Mallorca's most popular nightclub, leading the detectives to investigate a sophisticated drug network.

programme.title: Sanditon
programme.desc: A coach accident earns Charlotte Heywood an invite to the developing seaside resort of Sanditon to stay with the Parker family. After she arrives to Sanditon, she gets a chance to meet a variety of town's peculiar residents, including bachelor Sidney Parker and the mysterious Miss Lambe.

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: It's the first time Mike has been left alone with the ghosts at night, but he assures Alison she should have a night out and let her hair down.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Nadiya
programme.desc: Nadiya spends time with a charity that delivers school dinners to deprived children before travelling south to learn about an ancient fishing method that uses trained otters.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Bargain Hunt comes from from Topsham in Devon. Natasha Raskin Sharp is in charge, with experts Danny Sebastian and Gary Pe helping the teams.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The Bargain Hunt team pay a visit to the East of England Arena in Peterborough. Today's show is fronted by Natasha Raskin Sharp and lending a hand to the teams are Gary Pe and Ben Cooper.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Brighton Racecourse plays host to today's programme. Presenter Christina Trevanion leads the proceedings, while experts Catherine Southon and Mark Stacey help the teams track down bargains.

programme.title: Lead Balloon
programme.desc: Rick has mistakenly pledged a vast amount of money to Michael for a forthcoming sponsored charity event, so he attempts to get out of his commitment.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Driver
programme.desc: Peter Green is forced to do a School Trip while Kayla considers leaving home. Brad conducts his first funeral, and has an unexpected audience.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In a special edition of Antiques Roadshow, Fiona Bruce looks back at memorable items from recent years and finds out what happened next.

programme.desc: Patrick Grant of Savile Row and sewing teacher May Martin challenge the sewers with a complicated original pattern from the 1930s.
